body: Is there any reason why we don't want to use `Variable` here? There's this awkward pattern of `Variable(py_var->cdata, true)` in a lot of places, while it could have been just handled by the copy constructor
body_html: Is there any reason why we don't want to use Variable here? There's this awkward pattern of Variable(py_var->cdata, true) in a lot of places, while it could have been just handled by the copy constructor
body_text: Is there any reason why we don't want to use Variable here? There's this awkward pattern of Variable(py_var->cdata, true) in a lot of places, while it could have been just handled by the copy constructor
